events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible since this was quite disappointing.
The issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request for money back on a wrong item sent.
The support case has been assigned to agent Susan to handle the refund request for the incorrect order.
Hello! I’m Susan from customer support. I understand you're requesting a refund for the wrong item you received. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify and process your refund promptly?
Thanks for your quick reply! Here is my order number 56789 and attached the photo showing the product is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days and arrange a free return shipping label.
I appreciate your assistance and quick solution. A refund and free return sound perfect—thank you for resolving this.
The refund process has been initiated and the return shipping label sent to your email. Please let us know if there is anything else.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and everything has been resolved to your satisfaction. Feel free to contact us anytime.
As no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us and have a great day!
